properties.name: Ace Golf Range, Mini-Golf & Pro Shop‎
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1  Putt-putt / mini golf! A driving range! A pro shop! Lots of golfy fun for the whole family. It\'s been around for years & is a great local spot to get a little outdoor fun. Complete with a big pirate on the putt putt course :)

properties.name: Babe's Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Home of the "Double Decker Pizza" ! Yummy! A Brandon icon, locally owned & operated, since the early 90\'s at least. It\'s not fancy gourmet pizza - but everyone will have fun watching the guys hand toss & make the pizza in the open kitchen!

properties.name: Bonefish Grill
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Yummy & unique seafood, usually busy because it\'s so good. GREAT place for a dinner date :) Nice bar, awesome service. Open til 10:30 most nights.

properties.name: Campbells Dairyland
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1  Campbell\'s has been dishing up icecream (and burgers, curly fries, etc) since the 80\'s. THIS IS CLASSIC BRANDON!!! They even have a drive thru. You really can\'t go wrong here: "twisters", ice cream novelty goodies, and more!

properties.name: Center Place Arts & Civic Center
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Hidden art gem! Art shows & classes, exhibits, shows & performances, kids crafts, gift shop. It\'s small, local & dedicated to all the fine arts! Run by lovely folks & makes art accessible to everyone!

properties.name: Della's Delectables
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Try something different! This little storefront contains casual, but TASTY lunch fare. Incredible soups & fresh different salads. But it becomes an elegant bistro with live jazz by night ("Della\'s After Dark") - I haven\'t been, but hear the food is gourmet but you may have to be a little patient.

properties.name: Down to the Bone BBQ
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 You\'ll smell this BBQ driving by! Family owned & run - Dad out back grilling up a storm! You can\'t go wrong here. Pork, macaroni, beans, collard greens - it\'s all heavenly. A tiny little place, with an indoor counter & a picnic table or 2 outside. Very cheap too.

properties.name: Edward Medard Park
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1   Great outdoor fun for the family! Highlight: a sand/dune quary "mountain" full of old trees & roots to climb and explore! Picnic pavilions, playgrounds, camping, shaded walking paths, and a 700-acre reservoir for fishing and boating. Perfect place for birthday parties, or just bring the family out for lots of outdoor fun & exploring! Photographers will also enjoy all the wildlife - birds, turtles & more.

properties.name: Home Goods
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 HomeGoods offers unique and affordable home decor & furnishings (a TJ Maxx "sister" store).

properties.name: La Septima Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Brandon\'s first authentic Spanish restaurant. Traditional recipes, Ybor City style ambiance... a Brandon classic! Open til 8 on weekdays & 9 on Fri & Sat.

properties.name: Mellow Mushroom Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Crazy good pizza, crazy named restaurant! Lots of different style pizzas/calzones, or "build your own". Also wide selection of microbrew house beers. Always hoppin, good (loud-ish) bar.

properties.name: New York Diner & Bagel
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Finally Brandon / Valrico has a diner! I\'ve been for breakfast & lunch, often there\'s a wait for an open booth if they\'re busy. Food is okay - classic greasy-spoon not-healthy diner fare. Portions are massive. The pastries look amazing! I think they\'re open 24 hours, so it\'d be a good place to nurse a hangover ;-)

properties.name: O'Brien's Irish Pub
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Always hoppin on the weekends, "O\'Bs" is a fun rollicking Irish pub. Lots of live music. Outside patio & bar. Also a great authentic Irish menu - a good stop for a weeknight dinner when it\'s not as slammed. Fish & chips are good - the fish is HUGE. Shepherds pie is also a good choice. Servers & bartenders are cool. Prices are affordable.

properties.name: Oakfield Bowling Lanes
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1  Go bowling! Do something fun with the kids! Oakfield Lanes has been around since the 80\'s. Local classic.

properties.name: Planet Smoothie
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Delicious smoothies & funky tasty wraps/sandwiches.

properties.name: Ploy Thai
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Authentic, delicious & affordable Thai food. Among THE best Thai food in Tampa / Brandon! The curries, soups & specials are always tops. Service is friendly & polite. (It\'s in the same place as the Chili\'s)

properties.name: Romano's Greek Salads & Subs
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Yummy family-style Greek food, cheap too! North side of Robertson, by the Publix. Little tiny store front is deceptive! It\'s a must-eat! Gyros & greek salads are the obvious choices, but try some of their other specialities as well!

properties.name: Taste of India
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Some of THE BEST Indian food I\'ve ever had. Hands down! Truly authentic, huge menu, service is impeccable. A lovely dining experience that\'s very affordable. Get lots of different little dishes & share them amongst the table so you can taste the variety! I\'ve started ordering dishes I can\'t even pronounce just for the suprise! I\'m never disappointed & always leave stuffed.

properties.name: The Oaks Bar & Grille
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Cool, old-Florida style eats. Great seafood & soups/salad/sandwich fare. Gotta try the jerk chicken wings! The servers are fun & friendly. Great bar with lots on tap. Laid back place & a favorite place when I need a break from all the chain restaurants!

properties.name: Yokohama Japanese & Sushi
properties.description: Posted by Katiemw1 Delightful, authentic, quiet Japanese restaurant. I always leave stuffed & happy! Service is lovely, sushi chefs are talented & artful. Definitely affordable. The "strip mall" location is deceiving - this is a great local spot when you\'re sick of chain restaurants, craving REAL Japanese food, or want to impress an out-of-towner (or date!)
